markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bane Oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2068)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=121" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Bane oil_ comes in as many forms as the [_bane_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1041) weapon property rune. Coating a weapon with the oil gives the weapon the benefit of one type of _bane_ rune for 1 minute. A weapon can be coated in only one type of _bane oil_ at a time. Any new application of this oil supersedes any previous one. If a weapon has the _bane_ rune, this oil has no effect if it's of the same type as the rune.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bane Oil

text: <title level="1" right="Item 3" pfs="Standard" > Bane Oil Source Treasure Vault pg. 86 2.0 Price 12 gp Usage held in 2 hands Bulk L Activate Single Action (manipulate) --- Bane oil comes in as many forms as the bane weapon property rune. Coating a weapon with the oil gives the weapon the benefit of one type of bane rune for 1 minute. A weapon can be coated in only one type of bane oil at a time. Any new application of this oil supersedes any previous one. If a weapon has the bane rune, this oil has no effect if it's of the same type as the rune.
